item.title: Marking as deprecated in C++14
item.description: The upcoming C++14 standard introduces an attribute for marking declarations as deprecated, useful for discouraging any use of the declared entity.

item.title: Ambiguous raw pointers
item.description: C++ has recently been giving us more and more ways to write better, safer code. It is now commonly accepted that raw pointers should be avoided, as better alternatives are usually available. We look at the fundamental properties of raw pointers that make them unsuitable for modern code.

item.title: Custom syntax highlighting with Jekyll and Pygments
item.description: Jekyll's built-in syntax highlighting doesn't always come out the way you want it. Learn how to customize the behavior of the Pygments highlighter in Jekyll.
